items.title: My siblings don’t earn nearly as much as me. Should my parents leave me less money in their will?
items.description: “I’m concerned that my parents are going to strike me from any will.”

items.title: ‘She got divorced 4 years ago’: My friend, 72, has COPD. She has one son. Does she need to write a will?
items.description: “He is already on her bank accounts.”
